body:
okay so school just started and after being banned from avicus for reasons *ahem* ddos threats to atdit xd *ahem* i've been looking at how avicus relates to school for some reason

the teachers who have been there longer are the seniors and the new teachers are jrs

my homeroom teacher reminds me of an younger Nemo

the principal is ALM and the old principal is keenan

the vice principal is an admin ( i dont know any admins, the ones i know are demoted or have left )

the nurse is what used to be kashike

it's so weird and this is why it's in off topic
thanks for your time :)

title: Avicus and School
